title: #230: Don't F**k with Cats, Part 4
description:
Laura, Jim and Lisa continue breaking down Episode #2 of the Netflix breakout show Don't F**k With Cats and Laura and Jim offer a cautionary tale to those involved with working on cases involving violence and abuse.
